metadata.note: All spend_ratios and asset_allocation sum to 1.0. Ratios represent % of post-tax income/assets.

jethalal.name: Jethalal (Mercury + Mars)
jethalal.archetype: SME Businessman - High Risk, High Cash Flow

investment_behaviors.time_horizon: Medium-term (5-7 years for property, immediate for business)
investment_behaviors.frequency: Active trader in real estate, opportunistic equity positions

spending_notes.roti: High business lunches (₹2,500-5,000 meals), client dinners, entertainment
spending_notes.makan: Multiple properties (primary, investment, commercial), frequent upgrades
spending_notes.safar: Multiple vehicles (SUV + sedan), fuel for business, frequent travel
spending_notes.sehat: Basic coverage via business insurance, minimal personal focus
spending_notes.shiksha: Premium schools for kids (₹3-5 lakh/year), international education for sons/daughters
spending_notes.shauq: Country club memberships, golf, nightlife, entertainment, hobby vehicles
spending_notes.tech: Business software subscriptions, latest phones, trading terminals
spending_notes.nivesh: 30% reinvested into business expansion, real estate, property development

jethalal.wealth_accumulation_strategy: Real estate appreciation + business profits reinvestment. Typical goal: 2-3 properties by age 50, business EBITDA ₹50L+
jethalal.financial_vulnerabilities: Overleveraged in properties, irregular income creates cash flow stress, poor diversification

bhide.name: Bhide (Jupiter + Saturn)
bhide.archetype: Teacher/Middle Class - High Savings, Low Risk

investment_behaviors.primary_vehicle: FDs (5-10 year tenures), PPF, government securities, SIPs via salary
investment_behaviors.loss_tolerance: Very low (willing to accept 0% real returns for security)
investment_behaviors.frequency: Infrequent, yearly rebalancing, systematic SIP contributions

spending_notes.roti: Family meals at home (₹500-800/day), budgeted groceries, no dining out culture
spending_notes.safar: One 2-wheeler or public transport commute, minimal car ownership
spending_notes.sehat: Group health insurance via employer, preventive care
spending_notes.shiksha: Children in government or affordable private schools (₹50-100k/year), coaching classes ₹5-10k/month
spending_notes.shauq: Occasional cinema, local restaurants, religious festivals
spending_notes.tech: Basic smartphone (₹15-25k), functional laptop, no gaming devices
spending_notes.nivesh: 15% of surplus into FDs (₹10-15k/month), PPF (₹50k/year), mutual fund SIP (₹5-10k/month)

bhide.wealth_accumulation_strategy: Compound interest through FDs. By retirement: ₹80L-150L accumulated (FD corpus + PPF). Primary residence owned, children educated without loans.
bhide.financial_vulnerabilities: Inflation eroding real returns, low equity exposure, limited wealth creation upside

babita.name: Babita (Venus + Rahu)

investment_behaviors.primary_vehicle: Gold/jewelry (emotional), trending mutual funds, real estate for lifestyle
investment_behaviors.time_horizon: Short to medium-term (2-5 years for fashion trends, 10+ for property)
investment_behaviors.frequency: Frequent impulse purchasing, seasonal investment planning

spending_notes.roti: Dining out at upscale restaurants (₹1,500-3,000 per meal), premium cafes, branded foods
spending_notes.makan: Apartment in upscale locality (₹25-50k rent), home décor upgrades, furniture
spending_notes.safar: Frequent cabs/Ola, occasional car rental for outings
spending_notes.sehat: Spa, wellness treatments (₹5-10k/month), premium fitness center, yoga classes
spending_notes.shiksha: Personality development, dance/music classes, career upskilling, online courses
spending_notes.shauq: Fashion (₹30-50k/month), jewelry (₹1-5L/year), restaurants, travel, events, events
spending_notes.tech: Premium iPhone (₹60-120k), smartwatch, gaming devices, latest wearables
spending_notes.nivesh: Gold jewelry (emotional purchase), occasional mutual fund SIPs (₹10k/month), real estate investment

babita.wealth_accumulation_strategy: Gold as inflation hedge + real estate appreciation. Focus: Premium property in aspirational area. Goal: ₹50L+ gold ornaments, 1-2 investment properties by 45.
babita.financial_vulnerabilities: Impulse spending (35% of income on lifestyle), emotional gold attachment, poor equity discipline

iyer.name: Iyer (Mercury + Rahu)
iyer.archetype: Tech Worker - Gadgets, Crypto, US Equity
iyer.income_stability: Stable to high (rapid increments, stock options)

investment_behaviors.primary_vehicle: SIP in tech/growth funds, crypto (Bitcoin/Ethereum), US equities via Interactive Brokers
investment_behaviors.time_horizon: Long-term (30+ years to retirement, immediate for crypto trading)
investment_behaviors.frequency: Active crypto trading (10-11 PM after work), systematic SIP investments, annual rebalancing

spending_notes.roti: Food delivery (Swiggy/Zomato), premium meals, coffee culture (₹500-1000/day)
spending_notes.makan: Trendy locality apartment (₹25-40k rent), modern furniture, smart home gadgets
spending_notes.safar: Occasional Uber, metro card, electric 2-wheeler planned
spending_notes.sehat: Health insurance + fitness gym (₹5-10k/month), occasional health tracking devices
spending_notes.shiksha: Online certifications (Coursera/Udemy), cloud training, programming bootcamps (₹10-50k/year)
spending_notes.shauq: Gaming events, nightlife in tech hubs, travel (₹30-50k/quarter)
spending_notes.tech: Latest iPhone (₹100-150k), gaming laptop (₹1.5-2.5L), smartwatch, VR headset, accessories
spending_notes.nivesh: Monthly SIP ₹25-50k in tech funds, crypto trading (₹50-200k p.a.), US equity positions via brokers

iyer.wealth_accumulation_strategy: Crypto + equities for compounding, real estate for stability. Goal: ₹2-5 crore NW by 45 via SIPs, crypto appreciation, primary residence, and international investments.
iyer.financial_vulnerabilities: Crypto volatility (25% allocation risk), speculative behavior, high tech spending limiting savings

sodhi.name: Sodhi (Mars + Saturn)
sodhi.archetype: Mechanical Heart - Vehicles, Land, Tangible Assets
sodhi.monthly_income_range: ₹60,000 - ₹2,50,000 (mechanic, driver, small logistics owner, or tradesperson)

investment_behaviors.primary_vehicle: Land/real estate (agricultural, commercial), vehicles (motorcycles, trucks, cars)
investment_behaviors.time_horizon: Medium to long-term (land appreciation 10+ years, vehicle rotation 5-7 years)
investment_behaviors.decision_style: Tangible-asset focused, value-conscious, suspicious of paper assets
investment_behaviors.loss_tolerance: Medium (15-20% acceptable if asset is physical)
investment_behaviors.frequency: Infrequent land purchases, vehicle maintenance regular, FD renewals yearly

spending_notes.roti: Basic, functional meals (₹200-400/day), self-cooked food culture, minimal restaurant dining
spending_notes.makan: Basic dwelling or small plot (monthly ₹10-15k or owned), focus on acquiring more land
spending_notes.safar: Primary vehicle is passion (motorcycle ₹50-200k, truck ₹15-25L), fuel ₹5-15k/month, maintenance ₹2-5k/month, customization hobby
spending_notes.sehat: Basic coverage, accident-driven medical needs, minimal preventive care
spending_notes.shiksha: Technical training for children (mechanic, driving school, vocational), self-taught
spending_notes.shauq: Vehicle clubs, motorcycle rallies, DIY customization, rural/motorsport passion
spending_notes.tech: Minimal (basic phone ₹5-10k, functional), no internet culture
spending_notes.nivesh: 18% into land purchases (goal: 1-2 acres), FDs for land down payment (₹20-50k/month), vehicles as productive assets

sodhi.wealth_accumulation_strategy: Land appreciation (5-8% CAGR). By 60: 2-5 acres of commercial/agricultural land, 2-3 vehicles (owned), ₹50-100L in net worth from tangible assets.
sodhi.financial_vulnerabilities: No liquidity from land holdings, over-concentration in single geography, vehicle maintenance costs rising

popatlal.name: Popatlal (Saturn + Weak Venus)
popatlal.archetype: Bachelor Hoarder - Cash Hoarding, Zero Spending

investment_behaviors.primary_vehicle: Cash hoarding (savings account), long-term FDs, gold bars, real estate waiting
investment_behaviors.time_horizon: Indefinite (comfort in accumulation, paralysis in deployment)
investment_behaviors.loss_tolerance: Zero (loss-aversion bias, can't tolerate any decline)
investment_behaviors.frequency: Very infrequent, emergency-driven only, no active investment rebalancing

spending_notes.roti: Basic meals at home (₹150-250/day), no dining out or social eating, minimal food pleasure
spending_notes.makan: Single-occupancy room/studio (₹10-15k/month or parent's home), zero comfort upgrades
spending_notes.safar: Minimal commute (walk, public transport, shared ride), no personal vehicle, travel anxiety
spending_notes.sehat: Group insurance coverage only, no health tracking, preventive care neglect
spending_notes.shiksha: Zero ongoing learning, no courses or development, stagnation
spending_notes.shauq: Zero entertainment, no hobbies, no friends/social life, complete lifestyle deprivation
spending_notes.tech: Functional phone only (₹8-15k), no internet culture, basic computer
spending_notes.nivesh: 65% into cash/savings accounts (2-3 years of emergency reserve), FDs ₹1-2L p.a., gold hoarding (physical bars/coins)

popatlal.wealth_accumulation_strategy: Hoarding without deployment. Typical NW at 50: ₹2-4 crore in cash/FDs (very real terms erosion), ₹30-50L in gold, ₹0 from real estate or equities.
popatlal.financial_vulnerabilities: Pathological hoarding (mental health issue), inflation erosion (extreme), zero real estate/equity upside, relationship avoidance affecting life satisfaction

tapu_sena.name: Tapu Sena (Rahu + Mars)
tapu_sena.monthly_income_range: ₹0 - ₹2,00,000 (student to early-career, parent-subsidized or first job)
tapu_sena.income_stability: Very low to unstable (pocket money, gig work, internships)

investment_behaviors.primary_vehicle: Crypto (meme coins, FOMO speculation), gaming in-app purchases, trending stocks
investment_behaviors.time_horizon: Ultra-short (days to weeks, zero patience for compounding)
investment_behaviors.loss_tolerance: Paradoxically high for small losses (₹100-1000), panic-selling at large drawdowns
investment_behaviors.frequency: Hyperactive (hourly crypto checking, daily game sessions), no discipline

spending_notes.roti: Food delivery, quick snacks, premium coffee (₹300-500/day), no home cooking
spending_notes.makan: Shared apartments with friends (₹10-20k/month), or parent-subsidized, zero maintenance
spending_notes.safar: Public transport + occasional Uber, no personal vehicle, cash-less commute via apps
spending_notes.sehat: Neglected, basic insurance only, fitness fad (membership unused), mental health ignored
spending_notes.shiksha: Pursuing degree or job training, but more invested in gaming/crypto than studies
spending_notes.shauq: Gaming (6+ hours/week), social outings with friends, travel (FOMO-driven), concerts, parties
spending_notes.tech: Latest gaming phone (₹50-100k), gaming laptop/console (₹1-2L), accessories, mods, skins (₹500-2000/month)
spending_notes.nivesh: Micro-investments in crypto (₹1-10k/month), parent-influenced mutual funds (if any), zero discipline

tapu_sena.wealth_accumulation_strategy: None. Living hand-to-mouth, zero long-term planning, crypto gambling treats as entertainment, not investment.
tapu_sena.financial_vulnerabilities: FOMO-driven speculation, gaming addiction (monetized by studios), crypto loss potential (40% allocation at risk), zero savings discipline, parent dependency

spending_category_definitions.roti: Food & Groceries - Home meals, groceries, basic dining, food delivery costs
spending_category_definitions.makan: Housing - Rent/mortgage, property maintenance, furnishing, home improvement, property taxes
spending_category_definitions.safar: Transport - Fuel, vehicle maintenance, auto-rickshaw/taxi/metro, vehicle EMI, travel
spending_category_definitions.sehat: Healthcare - Insurance premiums, doctor visits, medications, wellness, fitness, pandemic healthcare
spending_category_definitions.shiksha: Education - School/college fees, coaching, online courses, certifications, children's education
spending_category_definitions.shauq: Lifestyle/Entertainment - Dining out, pubs/bars, cinema, shopping, events, hobbies, entertainment
spending_category_definitions.tech: Gadgets/Technology - Smartphones, laptops, smartwatches, gaming devices, software subscriptions
spending_category_definitions.nivesh: Investment/Savings - Equity investments, FDs, gold, real estate purchases, crypto, business reinvestment

asset_allocation_definitions.equity: Stocks, mutual funds, ETFs, SIPs, equity-linked insurance
asset_allocation_definitions.fd: Fixed deposits, government securities, post office deposits, bonds, debt funds
asset_allocation_definitions.gold: Gold jewelry, bars, coins, sovereign gold bonds, gold ETFs
asset_allocation_definitions.crypto: Bitcoin, Ethereum, altcoins, meme coins, DeFi tokens, speculative digital assets
asset_allocation_definitions.real_estate: Primary residence, investment property, land, commercial real estate, REITs, agricultural property

comparative_insights.highest_lifestyle_spend: Babita (35% on shauq) > Tapu Sena (25% combined shauq + tech) > Jethalal (18% on shauq)
comparative_insights.highest_investment_discipline: Bhide (50% FD-centric) > Iyer (35% equities + 25% crypto) > Jethalal (30% nivesh)
comparative_insights.highest_real_estate_allocation: Sodhi (65% RE) > Jethalal (55% RE) > Tapu Sena (0% RE)
comparative_insights.highest_crypto_risk: Tapu Sena (40% crypto) > Iyer (25% crypto) > Jethalal (10% crypto)
comparative_insights.most_conservative: Popatlal (60% FD, 0% equity) > Bhide (50% FD, 15% equity)
comparative_insights.wealth_accumulation_ceiling: Iyer (₹2-5 crore) > Jethalal (₹1.5-3 crore) > Bhide (₹80L-150L) > Sodhi (₹50-100L) > Tapu Sena (₹0-50L) > Popatlal (₹2-4 crore nominal, negative real)
